item.title: Let Me Introduce Tasker
item.description: Introduction In most applications, you’ll need a way to update its data. If you’re not careful, your application will do almost all of its work on the main event thread because this thread runs your event methods. If you just drop your heavy task code into the main event thread, then the main event thread will be busy with the heavy task, instead of rushing off to look for any events from the screen or other applications.
